item.title: binary tree
item.description: A brief walkthrough of a binary tree in Idris. The final result: data Tree : Nat -> Nat -> Type where Leaf : (v : Nat) -> Tree v v Left : Tree lv lm -> (v : Nat) -> .{auto prf : lm `LT` v} -> Tree v v Right : (v : Nat) -> Tree rv rm -> .{auto prf : v `LT` rm} -> Tree v rm Node : Tree lv lm -> (v : Nat) -> Tree rv rm -> .
